summary.es: Senior Frontend Engineer especializado en Angular con foco en SSR, prerendering y arquitectura escalable. Más de 6 años de experiencia desarrollando aplicaciones complejas, integradas con CMS y desplegadas con Docker y Kubernetes.
summary.en: Senior Frontend Engineer specialized in Angular with a strong focus on SSR, prerendering, and scalable architecture. Over 6 years of experience building complex applications integrated with headless CMS and deployed using Docker and Kubernetes.
